attributes.action: Urge the Pope to preserve Limbo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Roman Catholic Church is considering the abolition of the ancient theological doctrine of Limbo.

This is of concern to British citizens, including many non-Catholics, and there is an active Campaign for the Preservation of Limbo led by Dr Mark Berry, a history lecturer at the University of Cambridge. 

The issue should be raised through Her Majesty's Amabassador to the Holy See.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
